text: “phwk khea klaw wa thi than mha phwk rea nan pheux wa rea ca di khearph sakkara xallxh tæ pheiyng xngkh deiyw læa lathing sing thi brrda brrphburusʹ khxng phwk reaa khy khearph sakkarama kranan hrux? Cng na sing thi than di sayya kæ phwk rea mayang phwk rea theid hak than xyu nı hmu phu phud cring”
